hotels.title: Perth Scarborough Escape Moments from Beach
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in coastal charm with a stay at the beachfront Rendezvous Hotel Perth Scarborough, perfectly positioned a stone's throw from Scarborough Beach and a 15-minute drive from Perth's CBD. Stroll along the golden sands to Brighton Beach, discover some of the city's finest cafés, or sip a cocktail at one of the myriad restaurants that dot this beautiful area. When you're ready to relax, retreat to your room and unwind on your balcony overlooking the sparkling Indian Ocean, before grabbing a bite at the onsite Straits Café, or a sip at the Lobby Bar.

hotels.title: Modern Apartment Escape Steps from Scarborough Beach near Perth
hotels.description: Discover the pristine beaches and seaside charm of Scarborough at your own pace, staying in a spacious, contemporary apartment at Seashells Scarborough, perfectly located just steps from one of the most sought-after beachfronts in Western Australia, which has had a A$100 million renovation. Spend days strolling along the coast, go cycling, or try your hand at surfing. Onsite, you can swim at the two outdoor pools, and if you want a night off cooking in your fully-equipped kitchen, treat yourself to waterside dining along the esplanade.
